title: Kannamma Kanvizhi Song Lyrics Ratsasan
stanzas:
Kannamma Kanvizhi Song Lyrics From Ratsasan tamil movie. Kannamma Kanvizhi Song is composed by Ghibran and sung by Sean Rolden.  Kannamma Kan vizhi Lyrics writter is Ram Kumar.
Kannamma Kanvizhi Song Lyrics 
kannamma kanvizhi
kanneerthaan en mozhi
nee illaa vaanathil
neelam thaan en vali
engu iruppaai
angu varuven
veru enna vendum
vinmeengal thangi
sellum veedu.v venniragil
kattivaitha koodu
idhu unnaale unnaale
indranathu irul
vaadum kaadu.
anbil nee
ennai soolntha gangai
annadhiyil moochadaitha
en vazhkai ini
ennaalum unnaale
naanaaven kaatrilandha
yaakkai.
idhu kanavaai maari
nee varuvaai
ena thinam thinam
vizhippom unakkenave
adhu varaiyil
ivazhvu adarvaname
ini eppodhu
ipboomi uyir perumo
sol ..
kannamma kanvizhi
kanneerthaan en mozhi
nee illaa vaanathil
neelam thaan en vali

engu iruppaai
angu varuven
veru enna vendum
